translations: n.（饰有闪光金属片的）透明丝织物

phrs.translation: 加萨尔, 透明丝织物
区域蒙古进口商, 区域蒙古买家

sentences.sentence: The whole is referred to by the Mongolians in English as the temple and in Mongolian as Khurul (Assembly of monks) or olna gazar (holy ground).
sentences.translation: 蒙古人在英语中将之称之为寺庙（temple），在蒙语中将之称之为卡库尔（Khurul）.[和尚会]或欧拉那·加沙尔[圣地]。
